      • calculateClientType

        public boolean calculateClientType(double kgSent,
                                   double totalValue,
                                   int select)
        This is method calculate the type of client. pre:A load of client was created as minimum.
        pre:The client has successfully submitted a load at least.
        Parameters:
        kgSent - is the attribute of client about the historical kilograms sent
        totalValue - is value with discount to pay
        select - is the position of the array of clients post: Returns updated as boolean that means if the client was upgrated to a new category or not.
        post: Sets the new category of client or not.
